articles.title: Trump and Putin meet about Ukraine
articles.description: A much-anticipated meeting between the U.S. and Russian leaders on Friday ended without agreement on a ceasefire or a broader deal about the war in Ukraine.

articles.title: Sewage Floods Gaza Hospital After Israeli Strike, as Childhood Malnutrition Soars
articles.description: Health officials in Gaza report that Israeli attacks have killed at least 21 people since dawn, and the emergency department of Gazaâ€™s Nasser Hospital flooded with raw sewage after an Israeli strike damaged nearby infrastructure.

articles.title: Flash floods in India and Pakistan kill over 280, scores still missing
articles.description: Heavy rains have caused flash floods in India and Pakistan, resulting in over 280 deaths and leaving many people missing.
